thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com
thread.title: TL Willis
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by TL Willis

author: TL Willis
title: TL Willis
text: I booked online but had a question on how to connect the reservation to another one on another date. I called and the gentleman was extremely helpful and would not let me go until he was sure all had been set up properly. Very good experience and I'm looking forward to my trip
